unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Free Ride?**
normalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Free Ride?**

unnormalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch of those hefty college fees? Don't fret, scholarship portals are here to potentially save the day! These online platforms are like digital treasure chests, brimming with opportunities to snag some much-needed financial aid. Think of it as a *jugaad* for your education!
normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pinch of those hefty college fees? Do not fret, scholarship portals are here to potentially save the day! These online platforms are like digital treasure chests, brimming with opportunities to snag some much needed financial aid. Think of it as a jugaad for your education!

unnormalised: Websites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi have become super popular in India, offering scholarships for everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to arts degrees at Banaras Hindu University. You can filter by your academic performance, your caste (SC/ST/OBC), or even your family income (below Rs. 6 lakhs? There's probably something for you!).
normalised: Websites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi have become super popular in India, offering scholarships for everything from engineering at I I T Delhi to arts degrees at Banaras Hindu University. You can filter by your academic performance, your caste (S C slash S T slash O B C), or even your family income (below rupee six lakhs? There is probably something for you!).

unnormalised: Just remember to double-check the deadlines (some are as early as 30/06/2024!), and have your documents (Aadhar card, marksheets, etc.) ready. The application process can sometimes feel like navigating the Delhi Metro at 09:00 hrs, but the potential reward is well worth it. Many scholarships cover tuition fees, hostel costs, and even expenses like books and that late-night chai run with your *yaar*. Some even offer Rs. 50,000 or more! Start your search today; you might just land that scholarship before the 15/08/2024 deadline rolls around. Good luck, and *padhai karo*!
normalised: Just remember to double-check the deadlines (some are as early as thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four!), and have your documents (Aadhar card, marksheets, etcetera) ready. The application process can sometimes feel like navigating the Delhi Metro at nine zero zero hours, but the potential reward is well worth it. Many scholarships cover tuition fees, hostel costs, and even expenses like books and that late-night chai run with your yaar. Some even offer rupee fifty thousand or more! Start your search today; you might just land that scholarship before the fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four deadline rolls around. Good luck, and padhai karo!
